label: 続日本紀
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: A continuation of the Nihon shoki (Nihongi) and the second of the Six National Histories (Rikkokushi), this work records events at the Nara court from the years 697-791. It also gives a range of information on the social and economic situations at the time, the conditions in the provinces, and various customs. [日本書紀、日本紀、六国史]
